application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Coastal Redwood - Reduce the southern and eastern side 1-1.5 metres to balance.T.2 London Plane - 3m Holistic Crown reduction to previous points.T.3 Purple Plum - Fell.T.4 Yew & Holly group - 1.5-2m Holistic crown reductions.T.5 Pittosporum - Fell.T.6 Yew - Annual trim to shape.T.7 Yew - Reduce by approx 1.5m & trim to shape.T.8 Cherry - Dead wood.T.9 Leyland Cypress - Reduce by 2m & trim face.T.10 Lawson cypress - Fell (in decline).
